title: public_frontend_config
description: Frontend-safe configuration contract. Must contain only non-sensitive settings suitable for web clients.

reduced_motion_mode.description: UX motion preference. `on` always reduces motion, `off` always allows full motion, and `system` defers to the client OS/browser preference (`prefers-reduced-motion`).

enable_focus_highlights.description: Enables high-contrast focus rings/highlights for keyboard navigation. Unsupported clients should ignore this flag and keep their default focus indicator behavior.

enable_command_palette.description: Enables command palette entry points (for example Cmd/Ctrl+K). Unsupported clients should hide command palette UI and continue to expose primary navigation surfaces.

enable_keyboard_shortcuts.description: Enables non-essential keyboard shortcuts (for example tab cycling and command actions). Unsupported clients should ignore this flag and keep mandatory accessibility keyboard behaviors intact.
